format: JavaScript (ES6 module syntax with LightningJS components)
description: This file defines a 'Home' page component for a recipe explorer app using LightningJS. It manages state and layout for displaying a grid of recipe cards, incorporates a search bar, and handles user input for navigation and selection.

classes.name: Home
classes.description: A LightningJS component representing the home page with search and recipe grid.

methods.name: onQueryChanged
methods.description: Updates the recipe list based on the search query.

methods.name: cardX
methods.description: Calculates the X position of a recipe card based on its index.

methods.name: cardY
methods.description: Calculates the Y position of a recipe card based on its index.

methods.name: clampFocus
methods.description: Ensures the focus index stays within valid bounds.

methods.name: ensureVisible
methods.description: Scrolls to make the focused recipe card visible.
